meanings.definition: A thin sheet of material, such as paper or plastic, with a design or letters cut out, used to reproduce the design on surfaces below.
meanings.sent1: I used a stencil to trace the shape onto my drawing.
meanings.sent2: She placed the stencil on the wall before painting the pattern.
meanings.sent3: The stencil slipped, creating a funny squiggle on the paper.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a stencil, imprinting memories on her heart.
meanings.sent5: The stencil revealed a beautiful flower when sprayed with paint.

meanings.definition: To mark or reproduce a design using a stencil.
meanings.sent1: He carefully stenciled the numbers on the box.
meanings.sent2: They decided to stencil the logo on the t-shirts for the event.
meanings.sent3: Stenciling the wall felt like playing with a giant coloring book.
meanings.sent4: Her words stenciled a picture of hope in his mind.
meanings.sent5: The artist stenciled a masterpiece on the canvas with precision.

meanings.definition: A design or pattern created using a stencil.
meanings.sent1: The stencil design on the cake looked perfect.
meanings.sent2: She admired the intricate stencil pattern on the tablecloth.
meanings.sent3: The stencil pattern on the shirt made everyone smile.
meanings.sent4: His life felt like a stencil, repeating the same pattern every day.
meanings.sent5: The stencil artwork on the wall captured everyone's attention.
